trans-unit.source: Update Message
trans-unit.target: Update Message

trans-unit.source: Update Message
trans-unit.target: Update Message

trans-unit.source: This operation was introduced with version 2011-08-18 of the Queue service API.
trans-unit.target: This operation was introduced with version 2011-08-18 of the Queue service API.

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation updates the visibility timeout of a message.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation updates the visibility timeout of a message.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this operation to update the contents of a message.
trans-unit.target: You can also use this operation to update the contents of a message.

trans-unit.source: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding, and the encoded message can be up to 64KB in size.
trans-unit.target: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding, and the encoded message can be up to 64KB in size.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, and <parameterReference>myqueue</parameterReference> with the name of your queue:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, and <parameterReference>myqueue</parameterReference> with the name of your queue:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service

trans-unit.source: This operation is supported for SDK 1.6 and newer versions.
trans-unit.target: This operation is supported for SDK 1.6 and newer versions.

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Queue service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10001</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Queue service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10001</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid pop receipt value returned from an earlier call to the <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> or <link xlink:href="5f574ef2-2371-4336-94de-c2cef61edb6f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Message</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the valid pop receipt value returned from an earlier call to the <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> or <link xlink:href="5f574ef2-2371-4336-94de-c2cef61edb6f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Message</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new visibility timeout value, in seconds, relative to server time.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the new visibility timeout value, in seconds, relative to server time.

trans-unit.source: The new value must be larger than or equal to 0, and cannot be larger than 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The new value must be larger than or equal to 0, and cannot be larger than 7 days.

trans-unit.source: The visibility timeout of a message cannot be set to a value later than the expiry time.
trans-unit.target: The visibility timeout of a message cannot be set to a value later than the expiry time.

trans-unit.source: A message can be updated until it has been deleted or has expired.
trans-unit.target: A message can be updated until it has been deleted or has expired.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="59e840ea-62da-4e1c-9cc2-8a70e919594e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Queue Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="59e840ea-62da-4e1c-9cc2-8a70e919594e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Queue Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Requires 2011-08-18 or newer.
trans-unit.target: Requires 2011-08-18 or newer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The body of the request contains the message data in the following XML format.
trans-unit.target: The body of the request contains the message data in the following XML format.

trans-unit.source: Note that the message content must be in a format that may be encoded with UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Note that the message content must be in a format that may be encoded with UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 204 (No Content).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 204 (No Content).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Queue service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Queue service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: The pop receipt of the queue message.
trans-unit.target: The pop receipt of the queue message.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value that represents when the message will be visible on the queue.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value that represents when the message will be visible on the queue.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.

trans-unit.source: Sample Request and Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Request and Response

trans-unit.source: The following request extends the visibility of a queue message by 30 seconds and updates its content.
trans-unit.target: The following request extends the visibility of a queue message by 30 seconds and updates its content.

trans-unit.source: The request is sent with the following headers:
trans-unit.target: The request is sent with the following headers:

trans-unit.source: The request is sent with the following XML body:
trans-unit.target: The request is sent with the following XML body:

trans-unit.source: After the request has been sent, the following response is returned:
trans-unit.target: After the request has been sent, the following response is returned:

trans-unit.source: An <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will fail if the specified message does not exist in the queue, or if the specified pop receipt does not match the message.
trans-unit.target: An <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will fail if the specified message does not exist in the queue, or if the specified pop receipt does not match the message.

trans-unit.source: A pop receipt is returned by the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation or the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.
trans-unit.target: A pop receipt is returned by the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation or the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.

trans-unit.source: Pop receipts remain valid until one of the following events occurs:
trans-unit.target: Pop receipts remain valid until one of the following events occurs:

trans-unit.source: The message has expired.
trans-unit.target: The message has expired.

trans-unit.source: The message has been deleted using the last pop receipt received either from <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: The message has been deleted using the last pop receipt received either from <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The invisibility time has elapsed and the message has been dequeued by a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request.
trans-unit.target: The invisibility time has elapsed and the message has been dequeued by a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request.

trans-unit.source: When the invisibility time elapses, the message becomes visible again.
trans-unit.target: When the invisibility time elapses, the message becomes visible again.

trans-unit.source: If it is retrieved by another <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request, the returned pop receipt can be used to delete or update the message.
trans-unit.target: If it is retrieved by another <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Messages</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request, the returned pop receipt can be used to delete or update the message.

trans-unit.source: The message has been updated with a new visibility timeout.
trans-unit.target: The message has been updated with a new visibility timeout.

trans-unit.source: When the message is updated, a new pop receipt will be returned.
trans-unit.target: When the message is updated, a new pop receipt will be returned.

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation can be used to continually extend the invisibility of a queue message.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Update Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation can be used to continually extend the invisibility of a queue message.

trans-unit.source: This functionality can be useful if you want a worker role to “lease” a queue message.
trans-unit.target: This functionality can be useful if you want a worker role to “lease” a queue message.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a worker role calls <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> and recognizes that it needs more time to process a message, it can continually extend the message’s invisibility until it is processed.
trans-unit.target: For example, if a worker role calls <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> and recognizes that it needs more time to process a message, it can continually extend the message’s invisibility until it is processed.

trans-unit.source: If the worker role were to fail during processing, eventually the message would become visible again and another worker role could process it.
trans-unit.target: If the worker role were to fail during processing, eventually the message would become visible again and another worker role could process it.
